job_tasks.phrase: Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the core responsibility of building software.

job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform
job_tasks.justification: Describes the act of creating and building a software platform.

job_tasks.phrase: work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack
job_tasks.justification: Details the development of specific software components and practices within the software stack.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
job_tasks.justification: Clearly states the task of implementing software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the software development aspect of integration with other teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.
job_tasks.justification: These are essential software development activities for ensuring quality and maintainability.
Indicates a focus on deploying and managing software within specific cloud-native infrastructure, which aligns with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions collaboration with DevOps, a key component of MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering, cloud-native environments, and Kubernetes. While LLMs are mentioned as the target application, the core responsibilities and required skills do not align with the specialized tasks of a GenAI Engineer, such as prompt engineering or fine-tuning models. The role appears to be more about building infrastructure and backend systems for LLM applications rather than developing the AI models themselves.
